record.title: Traveller's guide to and through the state of Ohio : with sailing directions for Lake Erie / by Edmund M. Blunt.
record.note: Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the American Antiquarian Society catalogue.

record.title: A true picture of emigration, or, Fourteen years in the interior of North America : being a full and impartial account of the various difficulties and ultimate success of an English family who emigrated from Barwick-in-Elmet, near Leeds, in the year 1831.
record.note: An account of experiences in Pike County, Illinois, as related to Edward Burlend by his mother, and recorded by him. Cf. 1966 edition, Historical introduction.

record.title: The two hundred and fiftieth anniversary of the settlement of the Jews in the United States, 1655-1905 : addresses delivered at Carnegie Hall, New York, on Thanksgiving Day, MCMV, together with other selected addresses and proceedings.
record.note: Published under direction of an executive committee appointed at a public meeting held in New York, April 9, 1905.
Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the American Antiquarian Society catalogue.

record.title: Two tracts : Information to those who would remove to America ; and, Remarks concerning the savages of North America / by Dr. Benjamin Franklin.
record.note: Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the American Antiquarian Society catalogue.

record.title: The United States and Canada, as seen by two brothers in 1858 and 1861.
record.note: Chapter I gives the itinerary of J. C. jun., in 1858 and A. C. in 1851.

record.title: The United States cook book : a complete manual for ladies, housekeepers, and cooks : with directions for preparing in the best and most economical manner, meats, vegetables, beverages, pastry, jellies, ices, etc., to lard and carve, to ornament and send to the table the different dishes and beverages, as also, to preserve different fruits, etc. : with particular reference to the climate and productions of the United States / by Wm. Vollmer ; translated by J.C. Oehlschlager.
record.note: Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the American Antiquarian Society catalogue.

record.title: Victoria, the British "El Dorado", or, Melbourne in 1869 : shewing the advantages of that colony as a field for emigration / by a colonist of twenty years' standing and late member of a colonial legislature ; with two coloured views and a map.
record.note: Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the Museum Victoria catalogue.

record.title: The voyage of the S.S. "Tainui" from Plymouth, 21st May, to Hobart, 30th June, 1887 and board-ship scraps / by W.M.C.
record.note: Verses and charades written on board ship.
Digitised copy is author's presentation copy to C.F. Pollock, signed: Christchurch, New Zealand, 20th March 1888.

record.title: The wanderings and fortunes of some German emigrants / by Frederick GerstÃ¦cker ; translated by David Black.

record.title: The wealth and biography of the wealthy citizens of the city of New York : being an alphabetical arrangement of the names of the most prominent capitalists whose wealth is estimated at one hundred thousand dollars and upwards, with the sums appended to each name, and genealogical and biographical notices of the principal persons : also, a valuable table of statistics concerning the wealth of the City of New York.
record.note: Compiled and edited by Moses Yale Beach.

record.title: Welshmen as factors : the successful prize essay at the International Eisteddfod of the World's Columbia Exposition, Chicago, 1893 / by "William Penn".

record.title: The West Virginia hand-book and immigrant's guide : a sketch of the state of West Virginia : geographical position, historical outline, state constitution, population, surface and soil, agriculture ... : with a brief notice of each county, and an official state directory and map / by J.H. Diss Debar.
record.note: J. H. Diss Debar was State Commissioner of Immigration.

record.title: Western emigration : narrative of a tour to, & one year's residence in "Edensburgh" (Illinois) by Major Walter Wilkey, an honest yeoman of Mooseboro', State of Maine.
record.note: "A more humorsome and interesting 'Traveller's guide to the West' was never before published, and by which it will be perceived that the famous 'Maine-Pine-Swamp Speculation' has been completely out-done!"
Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the American Antiquarian Society catalogue.

record.title: What the Dutch have done in the west of the United States / by George Ford Huizinga.

record.title: Where to emigrate and why : homes and fortunes in the boundless West and the sunny South : their climate, scenery, soil, productions, railroads, mining interests, and general resources ... &c. &c. : with a complete history and description of the Pacific railroad / by Frederick B. record.title: "Euterpe" : diaries, letters & logs of the "Star of India" as a British emigrant ship / compiled and edited by Craig Arnold.
record.note: Contains information on the life of an emigrant on board ship, motives for emigration and a summary of the various journeys Euterpe completed. Includes entries for key voyages to New Zealand in 1874, 1875-6, 1879 and 1884-5 and information on the life of sailors on board the ship.

record.title: Tract on astrology and magic : manuscript.
record.note: Incipit (folio 1b): "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. AhÌ£kaÌ„m sabÊ»ah lil-saÌ„Ê»ah wa-sharaÌ„Ê¼itÌ£uhaÌ„ wa-sÌ£ifatuhaÌ„ sÌ£ifat al-shams. Wa-bi-hi nastaÊ»iÌ„n. FasÌ£l fiÌ„ maÊ»rifat kitaÌ„b al-saÌ„Ê»ah al-khabar wa-huwa al-sabÊ»ah al-saÌ„miÊ» li-ayyaÌ„m al-sabÊ»ah wa-maÌ„ yakhtasÌ£sÌ£u bihimaÌ„. QaÌ„la AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ: Wa-Huwa alladhiÌ„ jaÊ»ala lakum al-nujuÌ„ma li-tahtaduÌ„ bihaÌ„ fiÌ„ zÌ£ulumaÌ„ti al-barri wa-al-bahÌ£ri. Wa-huwa kawkab allatiÌ„ fiÌ„ ayyaÌ„m al-sabÊ»ah. Wa-iÊ»lam waffaqaka AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ wa-arshadaka al-taqwaÌ bi-anna al-saÌ„Ê»ah al-awwal min yawm al-AhÌ£ad li-saÌ„Ê»at al-shams, wa-huwa tatÌ£laÊ»u fiÌ„ falak al-raÌ„biÊ» wa-yuqiÌ„mu fiÌ„ buruÌ„j shahr ..."
Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on cream color paper; catchwords.
Binding: Unbound; the codex is placed inside a folded sheet of parchment.
Colophon: "KatabaÌ„ Ê»AliÌ„ ibn HÌ£abiÌ„b (?) ibn Ê»AliÌ„ ibn MidhÌ£at (?) ghafar AllaÌ„h al-dhunuÌ„bahu."

record.title: 880-02 ShifaÌ„Ê¼ al-hÌ£aÌ„Ê¼im fiÌ„ sharhÌ£ baÊ»dÌ£ al-DaÊ»aÌ„Ê¼im : manuscript / AbuÌ„ al-QaÌ„sim ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m al-BarraÌ„diÌ„.
record.note: Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 18th century.

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. AllaÌ„humma yassir Ê»alaynaÌ„. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h faÌ„tÌ£ir al-saÌ„biÊ»ayn al-samaÌ„Ê¼ wa-al-ardÌ£, al-muÌ„jid al-muÌ„jadayn al-jism wa-al-Ê»ardÌ£, alladhiÌ„ jaÊ»ala al-khalq mutadaÌ„walan bayna al-ifnaÌ„Ê¼ wa-al-iÌ„jaÌ„d, muwahÌ£hÌ£idan bayna Ê»aÌ„lam al-isÌ£laÌ„hÌ£ wa-Ê»aÌ„lam al-ifsaÌ„d [crossed over] al-fasaÌ„d, wa-khasÌ£sÌ£a al-Ê»aÌ„lam al-mukallaf bi-al-ishqaÌ„Ê¼ wa-al-isÊ»aÌ„d, wa-jaÊ»ala al-Ê»ilm afdÌ£al wa-afkhar al-makaÌ„sib ..."
Script: In large clear naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the poem "al-DaÊ»aÌ„Ê¼im"; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Inside the front cover and folio 1a-1b: Miscellaneous quotations in different hands.

On folio 2a: "KitaÌ„b al-HÌ£aÌ„Ê¼im, ShifaÌ„Ê¼ al-hÌ£aÌ„Ê¼im fiÌ„ sharhÌ£ baÊ»dÌ£ al-DaÊ»aÌ„Ê¼im, taÊ¼liÌ„f al-Shaykh al-ImaÌ„m al-Ê»aÌ„lim al-Ê»allaÌ„mah AbiÌ„ al-QaÌ„sim ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m al-BarraÌ„diÌ„ al-MaghribiÌ„ al-NafuÌ„siÌ„, rahÌ£imahu AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-jamiÌ„Ê» al-muÊ¼miniÌ„n wa-al-muÊ¼minaÌ„t, al-ahÌ£yaÌ„Ê¼ minhum wa-al-amwaÌ„t, innahu huwa al-ghafuÌ„r al-rahÌ£iÌ„m. Katabahu al-faqiÌ„r al-hÌ£aqiÌ„r Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»AÌ„mir ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn HÌ£ubaysh(?) al-SamadiÌ„ al-NazwiÌ„."
On folio 2a: A statement dated 9 SÌ£afar 1243 of the Hijrah (1 September 1827), as follows: "TaÌ„riÌ„kh wusÌ£uÌ„linaÌ„ al-Yaman yawm 9 SÌ£afar, sanat 1243".
Title from folio 5a: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'ShifaÌ„Ê¼ al-hÌ£aÌ„Ê¼im fiÌ„ sharhÌ£ baÊ»dÌ£ al-DaÊ»aÌ„Ê¼im' ..."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with a long poem on ritual purity "Wa-qaÌ„la fiÌ„ al-wudÌ£uÌ„Ê¼ wa-al-tayammum wa-ghasl al-najaÌ„saÌ„t wa-al-ightisaÌ„l wa-al-janaÌ„bah wa-ahÌ£kaÌ„m al-tÌ£ahaÌ„raÌ„t": "... KaÊ¼annamaÌ„ al-satÌ£ru idhaÌ„ shumtahu // yusirru bi-al-dÌ£ihÌ£ki ilaÌ al-satÌ£ri. Ka-Ê»iqdi ghaydaÌ„Ê¼ Ê»alaÌ nahÌ£rihaÌ„ // mufasÌ£sÌ£alun bi-al-durri wa-al-shadhri. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 al-NahÌ£w wa-tafsiÌ„r shayÊ¼ min al-QurÊ¼aÌ„n : manuscript / AhÌ£mad ibn MuhÌ£ammad al-HÌ£addaÌ„diÌ„.
record.note: Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 18th century.

Incipit: "KitaÌ„b al-HÌ£addaÌ„diÌ„. BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. QaÌ„la al-faqiÌ„h al-ImaÌ„m al-mufassir al-zaÌ„hid AbuÌ„ NasÌ£r AhÌ£mad ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn RashdaÌ„n (?) ibn MuhÌ£ammad al-HÌ£addaÌ„diÌ„: LammaÌ„ faraghtu min tasÌ£niÌ„f kitaÌ„biÌ„ al-MuÌ„dÌ£ihÌ£ li-Ê»ilm al-QurÊ¼aÌ„n sÌ£annaftu kitaÌ„biÌ„ haÌ„dhaÌ„ minniÌ„ li-waladiÌ„ wa-li-saÌ„Ê¼ir al-MuslimiÌ„n wa-jaÊ»altuhu madkhalan li-tafsiÌ„r KitaÌ„b AllaÌ„h wa-maÊ»aÌ„niÌ„hi, wa-tanbiÌ„han Ê»alaÌ tÌ£uruqihi wa-mabaÌ„niÌ„hi, wa-raddan Ê»alaÌ al-mulhÌ£idiÌ„n wa-al-tÌ£aÌ„Ê»iniÌ„n fiÌ„ KitaÌ„b AllaÌ„h ..."
Layout: In one column of 18 lines.
Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
Includes a table of contents on folios 5a-7a.
Folio 141 is a duplicate of folio 11, written in the same hand.
Decoration: Headings and markings in red.

Colophon (flolio 137a): "Tamma KitaÌ„b 'al-NahÌ£w wa-tafsiÌ„r shayÊ¼ min al-QurÊ¼aÌ„n', bi-Ê»awn al-Malik al-MannaÌ„n. NasÊ¼alu AllaÌ„h al-salaÌ„mah min al-Ê»isÌ£yaÌ„n wa-al-najaÌ„h min al-niÌ„raÌ„n, innahu kariÌ„mun mannaÌ„n, rahÌ£iÌ„mun rahÌ£maÌ„n, wa-laÌ„ hÌ£awla wa-laÌ„ quÌ„wata illaÌ„ billaÌ„h al-Ê»AliÌ„ al-Ê»azÌ£iÌ„m."

record.title: 880-03 DiÌ„waÌ„n al-sÌ£abaÌ„bah : manuscript / AhÌ£mad ibn YahÌ£yaÌ ibn AbiÌ„ HÌ£ajalah.
record.note: Copied on Tuesday evening, five days remaining from the month of SÌ£afar, of the year 1123 of the Hijrah (14 April 1711), by SulaymaÌ„n ibn RabiÌ„Ê» (?) ibn HÌ£armal (?) ibn HÌ£amad al-Ê»AÌ„miriÌ„, for his patron, SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn al-ImaÌ„m Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn MaÌ„lik al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„. Place of copying not mentioned.

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m, wa-bi-hi nastaÊ»iÌ„n. Rabbi Yassir. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ jaÊ»ala lil-Ê»aÌ„shiqiÌ„n bi-ahÌ£kaÌ„m al-gharaÌ„m ridÌ£an, wa-hÌ£abbaba ilayhim al-mawt fiÌ„ hÌ£ubb man yahwawnahu, fa-laÌ„ takun yaÌ„ fataÌ bi-al-Ê»adhli muÊ»taridÌ£an, fa-kam fiÌ„him min Ê»aÌ„shiqin wa-muhÌ£ibbin sÌ£aÌ„diq. ShiÊ»ran: RaÊ¼aÌ fa-hÌ£abba fa-raÌ„ma al-wasÌ£la fa-imtanaÊ»uÌ„ // fa-saÌ„ma sÌ£abran fa-aÊ»yaÌ„ nayluhu fa-qadÌ£aÌ ..."
Layout: In single column of 14 lines.
Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

On folio 1a: "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ KitaÌ„b DiÌ„waÌ„n al-sÌ£abaÌ„bah, li-maÌ„likihi al-faqiÌ„r lillaÌ„h Ê»azza wa-jall, SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn al-ImaÌ„m Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn MaÌ„lik al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„. Katabahu maÌ„likuhu bi-yadihi." Under it: "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b li-maÌ„likihi, ImaÌ„m al-MuslimiÌ„n, SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn MaÌ„lik al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„. Katabahu maÌ„likuhu bi-yadihi. TaÌ„riÌ„kh kitaÌ„biÌ„ haÌ„dhaÌ„ yawm al-Ithnayn, arbaÊ»ah wa-Ê»ishriÌ„n RabiÌ„Ê» al-AÌ„khir, sanat 1127 min al-Hijrah al-NabawiÌ„yah [29 April 1715]."
On Folio 1a: A partially legible ownership statement: "Intaqala haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b bi-al-shiraÌ„Ê¼ al-sÌ£ahÌ£iÌ„hÌ£ min SuÌ„q al-RustaÌ„q [obliterated words]."
On folios 2a-3b: Miscellaneous quotations in poetry and prose.

On folio 4a: "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ KitaÌ„b 'DiÌ„waÌ„n al-sÌ£abaÌ„bah', taÊ¼liÌ„f al-Shaykh al-ImaÌ„m al-faÌ„dÌ£il, al-adiÌ„b al-Ê»allaÌ„mah, ShihaÌ„b al-DiÌ„n AbiÌ„ al-Ê»AbbaÌ„s AhÌ£mad ibn AbiÌ„ HÌ£ajalah al-TilimsaÌ„niÌ„, lil-Sayyid al-MawlaÌ al-muÊ»azÌ£zÌ£am SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn ImaÌ„m al-MuslimiÌ„n Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„, khallada AllaÌ„h mulkahum. Katabahu Ê»abduhu SalmaÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn SalmaÌ„n bi-yadihi."
On folio 209b: Several ownership statements. And a reader's statement dated 7 RabiÌ„Ê» al-AÌ„khir, sanat 1257 (29 May 1841)
Decooration: Headings and markings in red.

Colophon (flolio 208a-208b): "HunaÌ„ intahaÌ aÌ„khir 'DiÌ„waÌ„n al-sÌ£abaÌ„bah' li-Ibn AbiÌ„ HÌ£ajalah, wa-nuqila min nuskhatin bi-khatÌ£tÌ£ al-Shaykh al-adiÌ„b al-faÌ„dÌ£il MuhÌ£ammad ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m al-ShaÌ„dhiliÌ„, al-shahiÌ„r al-maÊ»ruÌ„f bi-al-Badr al-SinaÌ„niÌ„ (?). Tamma al-kitaÌ„b bi-Ê»awn al-Malik al-WahhaÌ„b, Ê»ashiÌ„yat al-thulaÌ„thaÌ„Ê¼, li-khamsin baqyat min SÌ£afar, sanat thalaÌ„th wa-Ê»ishriÌ„n wa-miÊ¼ah wa-alf <sanah> min Hijrat al-NabiÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad [14 April 1711], SÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-aÌ„lihi, wa-sallam, Ê»alaÌ yaday al-faqiÌ„r ilaÌ AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ, SulaymaÌ„n ibn RabiÌ„Ê» (?) ibn HÌ£armal (?) ibn HÌ£amad al-Ê»AÌ„miriÌ„, nasakhahu li-makhduÌ„mihi wa-sayyidihi wa-muÊ»liÌ„ yadihi wa-rabbi niÊ»matihi wa-kaÌ„shif ghummatihi, SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn al-ImaÌ„m Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn MaÌ„lik al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„, atÌ£aÌ„la AllaÌ„h aÊ»maÌ„rahumaÌ„, wa-adaÌ„ma Ê»izzahumaÌ„, wa-manaÊ»a al-khutÌ£uÌ„b an tabuzzahumaÌ„, innahu jawwaÌ„dun kariÌ„m. Wa-laÌ„ hÌ£awla wa-laÌ„ quÌ„wata illaÌ„ billaÌ„h al-Ê»AliÌ„ al-Ê»AzÌ£iÌ„m. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm." Around the colophon (in red): "Tamma. Tamma. Tamma. Wa-kaÌ„na tahÌ£biÌ„ruhu Ê»alaÌ yaday Ê»abdihi, wa-asiÌ„r juÌ„dihi, wa-Ê»ariÌ„f ihÌ£saÌ„nihi, al-shaÌ„kir fadÌ£lahu, SulaymaÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn SulaymaÌ„n ibn BashiÌ„r al-MighfariÌ„ (?) [one word torn]. Wa-kaÌ„na al-faraÌ„gh min dhaÌ„lika yawm 10 RabiÌ„Ê» al-Awwal, sanat 1123 [18 April 1711]."

record.title: 880-03 QasÌ£iÌ„dat al-Burdah : manuscript / Sharaf al-DiÌ„n MuhÌ£ammad ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d al-BuÌ„sÌ£iÌ„riÌ„.
record.note: Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 18th century.

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. QaÌ„la al-Shaykh al-ImaÌ„m al-Ê»aÌ„lim al-Ê»allaÌ„mah, fakhr al-udabaÌ„Ê¼, jamaÌ„l al-bulaghaÌ„Ê¼, Sharaf al-DiÌ„n AbuÌ„ Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h MuhÌ£ammad ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d al-DulaÌ„sÌ£iÌ„ thumma al-BuÌ„sÌ£iÌ„riÌ„, rahÌ£mat AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi: KaÌ„na sabab inshaÌ„Ê¼iÌ„ hadhihi al-qasÌ£iÌ„dah al-mubaÌ„rakah anniÌ„ kuntu qad asÌ£aÌ„baniÌ„ khalitÌ£ faÌ„lij abtÌ£ala nisÌ£fiÌ„ wa-lam antafiÊ» bi-hi, fa-fakkartu an aÊ»mala qasÌ£idatan fiÌ„ madhÌ£ al-NabiÌ„, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, astashfiÊ»u bi-hi ilaÌ AllaÌ„h, Ê»azza wa-jall, fa-anshaÊ¼tu haÌ„dhihi al-qasÌ£iÌ„dah, wa-numtu, fa-raÊ¼yatu al-NabiÌ„, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, fiÌ„ al-manaÌ„m, fa-masahÌ£a Ê»alayya bi-yadihi al-mubaÌ„rakah, fa-Ê»uÌ„fiÌ„tu li-waqtiÌ„ ..."
Script: In good naskh script; in black ink, on cream color paper; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
Decoration: Interlinear translation in Ottoman Turkish (in red).
At the head of folio 1a (in a different hand): "QasÌ£iÌ„dat Burdah".
Colophon (flolio 14b): "Tammat QasÌ£iÌ„dat al-Burdah biÊ»awn AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ wa-hÌ£usn tawfiÌ„qihi, wa-sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad wa-aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi ajamÊ»iÌ„n."

record.title: 880-02 MuwasÌ£sÌ£il al-tÌ£ullaÌ„b ilaÌ QawaÌ„Ê»id al-iÊ»raÌ„b : manuscript / KhaÌ„lid ibn Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h al-AzÊ¹hariÌ„.
record.note: Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "... Ê»alayhi wa-inna al-jumlah aÊ»amm min al-kalaÌ„m, fa-kull kalaÌ„m jumlah wa-laÌ„ yanÊ»akis, alaÌ„ taraÌ anna nahÌ£wa jumlat In qaÌ„ma Zaydun fiÌ„ qawlika In qaÌ„ma Zaydun qaÌ„ma Ê»Amr, wa-summiya jumlatan wa-laÌ„ yusmmaÌ kalaÌ„man li-annahu laÌ„ yahÌ£sunu al-sukuÌ„t Ê»alayhi, thumma inna al-jumlah tusammaÌ ismiÌ„yah in budiÊ¼at bi-ism ..."
Script: In ornate naskh script; in black ink, on thick cream color and greenish paper; with marginal and notes; two inserts of commentaries; catchwords.
Decoration: Titles and markings in red.

Colophon (flolio 15b): "Wa-fiÌ„ haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-qadr fiÌ„ haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-mukhtasÌ£ar kifaÌ„yah li-mutaÊ¼ammilihi. LillaÌ„h al-hÌ£amd wa-al-minnah. Bi-ismihi, subhÌ£aÌ„nuhu wa-taÊ»aÌ„laÌ, faragha min kitaÌ„batihi al-Ê»abd al-muftaqir Ê»AliÌ„ fiÌ„ yawm al-JumÊ»ah [crossed over] al-Sabt, fiÌ„ waqt al-zÌ£uhr, fiÌ„ Qaryat JizkiÌ„ (?). al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h Rabb al-Ê»AÌ„lamiÌ„n hÌ£amdan yuwaÌ„fiÌ„ niÊ»amah wa-yukaÌ„fiÌ„ maziÌ„dah, wa-sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ Ê»alaÌ RasuÌ„lihi MuhÌ£ammad, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-asÌ£hÌ£aÌ„bihi jamiÌ„Ê»an. AÌ„miÌ„n. YaÌ„ MuÊ»iÌ„n."

record.title: 880-02 KhizaÌ„nat al-akhyaÌ„r fiÌ„ sharhÌ£ buyuÌ„Ê»aÌ„t al-khiyaÌ„r : manuscript / KhamiÌ„s ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d ibn Ê»AliÌ„.
record.note: Copied by Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn MubaÌ„rak ibn Ê»Umar ibn HilaÌ„l ibn Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h, who was in the service of the Ê»UmaÌ„niÌ„ ruler NaÌ„sÌ£ir ibn Murshid al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„ (MuÊ¼ayyad al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„, NaÌ„sÌ£ir ibn Murshid, active 17th century).

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. Rabbi yassir, YaÌ„ KariÌ„m. MimmaÌ„ anshaÊ¼ahu al-Ê»AÌ„lim al-Ê»allaÌ„mah, wahÌ£iÌ„d dahrihi wa-nasiÌ„j wahÌ£dihi, QaÌ„dÌ£iÌ„ al-MuslimiÌ„n KhamiÌ„s ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d ibn Ê»AliÌ„, rahÌ£imahu AllaÌ„h. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ antÌ£aqa bi-al-hÌ£ikamah alsun al-Ê»ulamaÌ„Ê¼ al-Ê»aÌ„rifiÌ„n, wa-jalaÌ„ ghishaÌ„wat al-shakk Ê»an absÌ£aÌ„r basÌ£aÌ„Ê¼ir al-Ê»uqalaÌ„Ê¼ al-khaÌ„Ê¼ifiÌ„n, wa-kashafa hÌ£ujub al-yaqiÌ„n Ê»an aÊ»yun quluÌ„b al-awliyaÌ„Ê¼ al-muhtadiÌ„n ... wa-sammaynaÌ„hu bi-kitaÌ„b 'KhizaÌ„nat al-akhyaÌ„r fiÌ„ sharhÌ£ buyuÌ„Ê»aÌ„t al-khiyaÌ„r' ..."
Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitaÌ„b al-mubaÌ„rak al-musammaÌ bi-KhizaÌ„nat al-akhyaÌ„r fiÌ„ buyuÌ„Ê»aÌ„t al-khiyaÌ„r, bi-Ê»awn al-Malik al-jabbaÌ„r al-Ê»aziÌ„z al-ghaffaÌ„r, wa-kaÌ„na sÌ£adara haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b bi-khatÌ£tÌ£ maÌ„likihi al-Ê»AÌ„lim al-Ê»aÌ„mil ... KhamiÌ„s ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d ibn Ê»AliÌ„ ... wa-kaÌ„na dhaÌ„lika fiÌ„ sabÊ» wa- [... ... ...] min al-Hijrah al-NabawiÌ„yah ... wa-kaÌ„na tamaÌ„muhu min nuskhah bi-khatÌ£tÌ£ muÊ¼allifihi al-FaqiÌ„h Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn GhassaÌ„n ibn MuhÌ£ammad (?) ... Katabahu al-faqiÌ„r lillaÌ„h al-GhaniÌ„ Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn MubaÌ„rak ibn Ê»Umar ibn HilaÌ„l ibn Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h al-MurtajiÌ„ (?) ... wa-kaÌ„na yawmiÊ¼dhin fiÌ„ khidmat al-Malik ... NaÌ„sÌ£ir ibn Murshid ibn MaÌ„lik ... al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„, amaddahu AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ bi-suÊ»uÌ„d ayyaÌ„mih ... bi-hÌ£urmat Sayyid al-MursaliÌ„n wa-al-RuÌ„hÌ£ al-AmiÌ„n, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhimaÌ„, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi ajmaÊ»iÌ„n."

record.title: 880-02 HÌ£all al-MuÌ„jiz : manuscript / MuhÌ£ammad ibn MuhÌ£ammad al-AqsaraÌ„Ê¼iÌ„.
record.note: Copied on Monday 18 DhuÌ„ al-QaÊ»dah of the year 1126 of the Hijrah (25 November 1714). Name of copyist, etc. obliterated.

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h Rabb al-Ê»AÌ„lamiÌ„n, wa-al-sÌ£alaÌ„h wa-al-salaÌ„m Ê»alaÌ afdÌ£al anbiyaÌ„Ê¼ihi MuhÌ£ammad wa-aÌ„lihi ajmaÊ»iÌ„n. Wa-baÊ»d, <fa-inna tÌ£alab> fa-inna al-tÌ£ibb Ê»ilmun shariÌ„f li-sharaf mawdÌ£uÌ„Ê»ihi wa-wathaÌ„qat dalaÌ„Ê¼ilihi, wa-shiddat al-hÌ£aÌ„jah ilayhi, wa-fiÌ„ al-ishtighaÌ„l bi-hi min al-thawaÌ„b al-jaziÌ„l maÌ„ laÌ„ yuÌ„sÌ£afu, li-tadÌ£ammunihi izÌ£haÌ„r athaÌ„r rahÌ£mat AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ Ê»alaÌ Ê»ibaÌ„dihi, wa-al-tawassul bi-hi ilaÌ iraÌ„hÌ£at nufuÌ„sihim Ê»an al-asqaÌ„m, fa-li-dhaÌ„lika sÌ£araftu baÊ»dÌ£ zaman tahÌ£sÌ£iÌ„liÌ„ ilayhi, wa-qaraÊ¼tu al-mukhtasÌ£araÌ„t al-mashhuÌ„rah fiÌ„hi Ê»alaÌ waÌ„lidiÌ„ ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-HÌ£all al-MuÌ„jiz, li-annahu yahÌ£ullu maÌ„ fiÌ„hi min al-mushkilaÌ„t wa-al-mulghazaÌ„t, wa-maÌ„ tawfiÌ„qiÌ„ illaÌ„ billaÌ„h, Ê»alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi uniÌ„b ..."
Script: In good naskh script; in black ink, on polished white paper; catchwords.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "Tammat kitaÌ„bat haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b bi-Ê»awn al-Malik al-WahhaÌ„b, al-shaÌ„fiÌ„ limaÌ„ asÌ£aÌ„b, wa-huwa al-musammaÌ bi-SharhÌ£ al-AqsÌ£araÌ„Ê¼iÌ„, yawm al-Ithnayn, wa 18 min al-QaÊ»dah, sanat 1126 [25 November 1714], bi-qalam al-faqiÌ„r ilaÌ AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ, al-mudhnib [the rest of the colophon obliterated]."

record.title: 880-02 QurÊ¼aÌ„n : manuscript.
record.note: Script: In splendid calligraphic naskh script; in black ink, on cream color paper; badly water-stained; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings in gold, red, and blue; text within line border of gold and blue; Ê»unwaÌ„ns in gold and colors at the beginning; gilt floral decorations in the margins.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover inside colored cloth jacket.

record.title: Student's exercise book : manuscript.
record.note: Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. SÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ wa-MawlaÌ„naÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi wa-sallam. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ hadaÌ„naÌ„ lil-iÌ„maÌ„n wa-al-IslaÌ„m, wa-al-sÌ£alaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ NabiÌ„yihi MuhÌ£ammad alladhiÌ„ istanqadhanaÌ„ bi-hi min Ê»ibaÌ„dat al-awthaÌ„n wa-al-asÌ£naÌ„m, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi wa-sallam, wa-asÌ£hÌ£aÌ„bihi al-nujabaÌ„Ê¼ al-bararah al-kiraÌ„m. Wa-baÊ»da haÌ„dhaÌ„, fa-al-gharadÌ£ min haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b dhikr al-sÌ£alaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ al-NabiÌ„, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam wa-fadÌ£aÌ„Ê¼ilihaÌ„, nadhkuruhaÌ„ mahÌ£fuÌ„dhat al-asaÌ„niÌ„d li-yashula hÌ£ifzÌ£uhaÌ„ Ê»alaÌ al-qaÌ„riÌ„ ..."
Script: In primitive naskh script; in black ink, on white European paper; catchwords.
Binding: The loose three quires of which some leaves seem to be missing are placed inside a folded deteriorated sheet of dark brown leather.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... AllaÌ„humma sÌ£alli Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ wa-MawlaÌ„naÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad ridÌ£aÌ„ nafsika. AllaÌ„humma sÌ£alli Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ wa-MawlaÌ„naÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad midaÌ„da kalimaÌ„tika. AllaÌ„humma sÌ£alli Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ wa-MawlaÌ„naÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad milÊ¼a samawaÌ„tika wa-ardÌ£ika. AllaÌ„humma sÌ£alli Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ wa-MawlaÌ„naÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad zinata Ê»arshika. AllaÌ„humma sÌ£alli Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ wa-MawlaÌ„naÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad Ê»adada makhluÌ„qaÌ„tika. AllaÌ„humma sÌ£alli ..."

record.title: 880-03 LawaÌ„miÊ» al-asraÌ„r fiÌ„ SharhÌ£ MatÌ£aÌ„liÊ» al-anwaÌ„r : manuscript / MuhÌ£ammad ibn MuhÌ£ammad al-QutÌ£b al-TahÌ£taÌ„niÌ„.
record.note: Copied on 12 ShaÊ»baÌ„n of the year 1108 of the Hijrah (6 March 1697), by YaÊ»quÌ„b ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn HidaÌ„yah al-QazwiÌ„niÌ„ (?) al-AwaÌ„liÌ„. Place of copying not mentioned.
Title from folio 3a "... wa-sammaytuhaÌ„ bi-'LawaÌ„miÊ» al-asraÌ„r fiÌ„ SharhÌ£ MatÌ£aÌ„liÊ» al-anwaÌ„r' ..."

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m, wa-bi-hi thiqatiÌ„. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h fayyaÌ„dÌ£ dhawaÌ„rif al-Ê»awaÌ„rif wa-mulhim hÌ£aqaÌ„Ê¼iq al-maÊ»aÌ„rif, waÌ„hib hÌ£ayaÌ„t al-Ê»aÌ„limiÌ„n wa-raÌ„fiÊ» darajaÌ„t al-Ê»aÌ„limiÌ„n [al-Ê»aÌ„miliÌ„n (?)], wa-al-sÌ£alaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ khayr bariÌ„yatihi fiÌ„ khaliÌ„qatihi, MuhÌ£ammad, wa-aÌ„lihi khayr aÌ„l, maÌ„ zÌ£ahara laÌ„miÊ» aÌ„l wa-khatÌ£ara maÊ»nan bi-baÌ„l. Wa-baÊ»d, fa-inna al-Ê»uluÌ„m Ê»alaÌ tashaÊ»Ê»ub funuÌ„nihaÌ„ wa-takaththur shujuÌ„nihaÌ„ arfaÊ» al-matÌ£aÌ„lib wa-anfaÊ» al-maÊ¼aÌ„rib, wa-Ê»ilm al-mantÌ£iq min baynihaÌ„ abyanuhaÌ„ tibyaÌ„nan wa-ahÌ£sanuhaÌ„ shaÊ¼nan ..."
Script: In medium clear naskh script; in black ink, on white polished paper; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Decoration: The phrases of "MatÌ£aÌ„liÊ» al-anwaÌ„r" in red.
Binding: In brownish red leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Colophon: "WaÌ„faqa al-faraÌ„gh min taswiÌ„d haÌ„dhihi al-sutÌ£uÌ„r min haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b al-mawsuÌ„m bi-al-MatÌ£aÌ„liÊ», li-khulaÌ„sÌ£at al-ikhwaÌ„n, al-Shaykh al-taqiÌ„ al-naqiÌ„, wa-al-radÌ£iÌ„ al-murdÌ£iÌ„, al-Shaykh YuÌ„suf ibn al-Shaykh Ê»AliÌ„ ibn JaÊ»far al-BarbuÌ„riÌ„ al-AwaÌ„liÌ„, Ê»alaÌ yad aqall al-Ê»ibaÌ„d Ê»amalan wa-aktharihim zalalan, ghariÌ„q bahÌ£r al-khatÌ£aÌ„yaÌ„ wa-al-dhunuÌ„b, YaÊ»quÌ„b ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn HidaÌ„yah al-QazwiÌ„niÌ„ (?) al-AwaÌ„liÌ„, tahÌ£riÌ„ran bi-al-yawm al-thaÌ„niÌ„ Ê»ashar min shahr ShaÊ»baÌ„n, khutima bi-al-khayr wa-al-rudÌ£waÌ„n, ahÌ£ad shuhuÌ„r sanat al-thaÌ„minah wa-al-miÊ¼ah baÊ»da al-alf HijriÌ„yah NabawiÌ„yah [6 March 1697], Ê»alaÌ muhaÌ„jirihaÌ„ afdÌ£al al-sÌ£alaÌ„h wa-al-salaÌ„m."

record.title: 880-03 DalaÌ„Ê¼il al-khayraÌ„t wa-shawaÌ„riq al-anwaÌ„r fiÌ„ dhikr al-sÌ£alaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ al-NabiÌ„ al-MukhtaÌ„r : manuscript / MuhÌ£ammad ibn SulaymaÌ„n al-JazuÌ„liÌ„.
record.note: Copied on Saturday, 12 DhuÌ„ al-QaÊ»dah, of the year 1151 of the Hijrah (21 February 1739). Place of copying not mentioned.
Title from folio 2a "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-KitaÌ„b 'DalaÌ„Ê¼il al-khayraÌ„t wa-shawaÌ„riq al-anwaÌ„r fiÌ„ dhikr al-sÌ£alaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ al-NabiÌ„ al-MukhtaÌ„r' ..."

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. Wa-sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi wa-sallam. QaÌ„la al-Shaykh al-FaqiÌ„h AbuÌ„ Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h MuhÌ£ammad ibn SulaymaÌ„n al-JazuÌ„liÌ„, rahÌ£imahu AllaÌ„h wa-nafaÊ»anaÌ„ bi-hi wa-bi-amthaÌ„lihi. AÌ„miÌ„n. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ hadaÌ„naÌ„ lil-iÌ„maÌ„n wa-al-IslaÌ„m, wa-al-sÌ£alaÌ„h wa-al-salaÌ„m Ê»alaÌ MuhÌ£ammad NabiÌ„yihi alladhiÌ„ intaqadhnaÌ„ bi-hi min Ê»ibaÌ„dat al-awthaÌ„n wa-al-asÌ£naÌ„m, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi al-nujabaÌ„Ê¼ al-bararah al-kiraÌ„m. Wa-baÊ»da haÌ„dhaÌ„, fa-al-gharadÌ£ fiÌ„ haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b dhikra [al-sÌ£alaÌ„h] Ê»alaÌ al-NabiÌ„, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, wa-fadÌ£aÌ„Ê¼iluhaÌ„, nadhkuruhaÌ„ mahÌ£dhuÌ„fat al-asaÌ„niÌ„d, li-yashula hÌ£ifzÌ£uhaÌ„ Ê»alaÌ al-qaÌ„riÊ¼ ..."
At the head of folio 1b (in a different hand): "AÊ»uÌ„dhu billaÌ„h min al-ShaytÌ£aÌ„n al-RajiÌ„m. YaÌ„ FattaÌ„hÌ£ iftahÌ£ lanaÌ„, abwaÌ„baka. NasÌ£run min AllaÌ„h wa-fathÌ£un qariÌ„b."
Script: In fairly good naskh script; in black ink, on thick cream color paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings and keywords in red; colored drawings on folio 12b and 13a.
Binding: In brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with gilded central medallion and geometric design.
Text ends on folio 80b. Followed by miscellaneous prayers and invocations (folios 81b-92b) in different hands.

Colophon: "Wa-waÌ„faqa al-faraÌ„gh min naskh haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-DalaÌ„yil yawm al-Sabt al-mubaÌ„rak, ithnay Ê»ashar fiÌ„ shahr DhiÌ„ al-QaÊ»dah sanat alf wa-miÊ¼ah waÌ„hÌ£id wa-khamsiÌ„n [21 February 1739]. Tamm. Faraghtu minhaÌ„ hÌ£aÌ„midan musÌ£alliyan musalliman YaÌ„ Rabbu fa-irhÌ£am man Ê»alaÌ kaÌ„tibihi tarahÌ£hÌ£uman." Araound the colophon: "AyaÌ„ qaÌ„riÊ¼a khatÌ£tÌ£iÌ„ saÊ¼altuka daÊ»watan ilaÌ AllaÌ„hi lil-Ê»abdi al-musiÌ„Ê¼i bi-fiÊ»lihi li-yaghfira AllaÌ„hu liÌ„ dhanbiÌ„ wa-yamhÌ£uÌ„ khatÌ£iÌ„yatiÌ„ wa-yarziqaniÌ„ rizqan mughnian (?)."

record.title: Treatise on "NifaÌ„s" and "HÌ£aydÌ£" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
record.note: Incipit of Section 1. The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... al-nifaÌ„s laysa la-hu aqall. Wa-qaÌ„la wa-qad rufiÊ»a ilaynaÌ„ fiÌ„ al-HÌ£adiÌ„th anna al-NabiÌ„, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, annahu qaÌ„la 'LaÌ„ nifaÌ„s aqall min usbuÌ„Ê»ayn'. Wa-law lam naÊ»lam haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-HÌ£adiÌ„th Ê»an al-NabiÌ„, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, sÌ£ahÌ£iÌ„hÌ£an laÌ„ akhadhnaÌ„ bi-hi. Wa-qaÌ„la wa-qad rufiÊ»a ilaynaÌ„ Ê»an AbiÌ„ MansÌ£uÌ„r annahu qaÌ„la aqall al-nifaÌ„s maÌ„ tÌ£ahurat Ê»alayhi fiÌ„ awwal walad waladathu. Wa-AllaÌ„h aÊ»lam ..."

Incipit of Section 2: "MasÊ¼alah manquÌ„lah min khatÌ£tÌ£ al-Shaykh al-Ê»AÌ„lim al-Ê»AllaÌ„mah SÌ£aÌ„lihÌ£ ibn WadÌ£dÌ£aÌ„hÌ£, rahÌ£imahu AllaÌ„h. Wa-ammaÌ„ al-amah idhaÌ„ hÌ£aÌ„dÌ£at hÌ£aydÌ£atan wa-inqatÌ£aÊ»a Ê»anhaÌ„ al-dam fa-jaÌ„Ê¼izun tazwiÌ„juhaÌ„ wa-tasarriÌ„haÌ„, li-annahu qaÌ„la baÊ»dÌ£ al-MuslimiÌ„n al-istibraÌ„Ê¼ bi-hÌ£aydÌ£ah. Wa-AllaÌ„h aÊ»lam. Wa-huwa qawlun min aqwaÌ„l al-MuslimiÌ„n, wa-qawl hÌ£attaÌ tahÌ£iÌ„dÌ£a hÌ£aydÌ£atayn. Wa-man akhadha bi-al-qawl al-awwal lam naqul innahu rakab (?) majar (?). MaÌ„ katabahu SÌ£aÌ„lihÌ£ ibn WadÌ£dÌ£aÌ„hÌ£ bi-yadihi naqaltuhu kamaÌ„ wajadtuhu ..."

Incipit of Section 3 (Preceded by a table of contents): "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. BaÌ„b fiÌ„ sÌ£ifat al-hÌ£aydÌ£ wa-dam al-istihÌ£aÌ„dÌ£ah. QaÌ„la AbuÌ„ al-Muddaththir: Dam al-hÌ£aydÌ£ damun ghaliÌ„zÌ£ aswad asyas laÌ„ yakaÌ„du yakhruju min al-thawb idhaÌ„ ghusila. Wa-qad dhukira lanaÌ„ anna Ê»AÌ„Ê¼ishah, radÌ£iya AllaÌ„h Ê»anhaÌ„, kaÌ„nat idhaÌ„ ightasalat fa-baqiya la-hu athar fa-ghayyarathu bi-shayÊ¼ min sÌ£ufrah. Wa-dam al-istihÌ£aÌ„dÌ£ah damun raqiÌ„q ahÌ£mar. HaÌ„dhaÌ„ nahÌ£fazÌ£. Wa-AllaÌ„h aÊ»lam ..."
Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on thick cream color paper; few notes on the margins; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings and keywords in red.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

On pleminary leaf 2b: An ownership statement: "Milk haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b intaqala li-SayyidinaÌ„ SaÌ„lim ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n, ishtaraÌ„hu min Bandar, taÌ„riÌ„kh yawm 12 ShawwaÌ„l, sanat 1226 [30 October 1811], wa-katabahu SaÊ»iÌ„d ibn KhamiÌ„s al-HilaÌ„liÌ„ bi-yadihi."

At the head of folio 10b: An ownership statement: "AÌ„la haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b al-mubaÌ„rak bi-al-shiraÌ„Ê¼ al-sÌ£ahÌ£iÌ„hÌ£ min SuÌ„q al-SÌ£ughraÌ bi-NazwaÌ li-Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn MasÊ»uÌ„d ibn RabiÌ„Ê»ah al-KindiÌ„."
On folio 99a: An ownership statement: "AÌ„la haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b Ê»alaÌ khalaf al-Shaykh Ê»AÌ„mir ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d. Wa-inniÌ„ al-aqall lillaÌ„h Ê»AqiÌ„l (?) ibn MurbihÌ£ (?) al-MundhuriÌ„."

Colophon of Section 1: "Tamma naskh haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-juzÊ¼ dÌ£uhÌ£aÌ al-JumÊ»ah, wa-thamaÌ„niyah wa-Ê»ishriÌ„n min shahr DhiÌ„ al-QaÊ»dah, sanat sitt siniÌ„n wa-arbaÊ»iÌ„n sanah baÊ»da alf sanah min Hijrat al-NabiÌ„ [23 April 1637], sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam. Naskhahu Khalaf ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn Khalaf al-KindiÌ„ al-NazwiÌ„ thumma al-NahÌ£liÌ„, ghafara AllaÌ„h la-hu wa-li-waÌ„lidayhi wa-li-jamiÌ„Ê» al-MuslimiÌ„n wa-al-MuslimaÌ„t, al-ahÌ£yaÌ„Ê¼ minhum wa-al-amwaÌ„t. Nasakhahu li-nafsihi. Wa-sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad al-NabiÌ„, wa-aÌ„lihi wa-sallam. Wa-laÌ„ hÌ£awla wa-laÌ„ quÌ„wata illaÌ„ billaÌ„h al-Ê»AliÌ„ al-Ê»AzÌ£iÌ„m al-Ê»AzÌ£iÌ„m."

Colophon of Section 2: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... fa-li-tajÊ»al tÌ£uhrahaÌ„ Ê»ashrat ayyaÌ„m wa-hÌ£aydÌ£ahaÌ„ khamsat Ê»ashar yawman, fa-tumsiku min al-khamsat Ê»ashar al-yawm al-hÌ£aydÌ£ Ê»an al-sÌ£awm wa-Ê»an al-sÌ£alaÌ„h Ê»ashrat ayyaÌ„m, wa-tusÌ£alliÌ„ khamsat Ê»ashar yawman wa-tasÌ£uÌ„m. Fa-idhaÌ„ qadÌ£at al-sÌ£awm Ê»alaÌ dhaÌ„lika wa-araÌ„dat al-badal badal al-Ê»ashr allatiÌ„ kaÌ„nat tahÌ£sabuhaÌ„ hÌ£aydÌ£an alhÌ£aqat maÊ»ahaÌ„ badal khamsat ayyaÌ„m hÌ£attaÌ tatimma khamst Ê»ashar yawman, fa-takuÌ„nu dhaÌ„lika istihÌ£aÌ„dÌ£ah minhaÌ„. Wa-ammaÌ„ in iÊ»taddat fa-Ê»anaÌ„haÌ„ haÌ„dhaÌ„ jaÊ»alat hÌ£aydÌ£ahaÌ„ khamsat Ê»ashar yawman wa-al-tÌ£uhr shahran. QaÌ„la wa-idhaÌ„ Ê»arafat waqt ummihaÌ„ fa-huwa lahaÌ„, wa-bi-hi taÊ¼khudhu fiÌ„ al-Ê»iddah al-sÌ£alaÌ„h wa-al-sÌ£awm ..."

Colophon of Section 3: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Qultu kayfa nasÌ£naÊ»u. Fa-Ê»alaÌ maÌ„ wasÌ£fta, fa-alladhiÌ„ Ê»arafnaÌ„ fiÌ„ dhaÌ„lika annahaÌ„ idhaÌ„ mudda bihaÌ„ al-dam baÊ»da ayyaÌ„m hÌ£aydÌ£ihaÌ„, wa-kaÌ„na dhaÌ„lika al-dam saÌ„Ê¼ilan aw qaÌ„tÌ£iran aw faÌ„Ê¼idÌ£an muttasÌ£ilan bihaÌ„ intazÌ£arat yawman aw yawmayn, mukhayyarah fiÌ„ dhaÌ„lika, taqÊ»udu fiÌ„ intizÌ£aÌ„rihaÌ„ Ê»inda al-sÌ£alaÌ„h wa-al-sÌ£awm. Fa-inn mudda bihaÌ„ al-dam fawqa al-yawm aw al-yawmayn fa-qad qaÌ„la man qaÌ„la inna Ê»alayhaÌ„ badal ..." Followed by three blank leaves.

record.title: 880-02 NadÌ£rat al-ighriÌ„dÌ£ fiÌ„ nusÌ£rat al-qariÌ„dÌ£ : manuscript / al-MuzÌ£affar ibn al-FadÌ£l al-HÌ£usayniÌ„.
record.note: Title from folio 2b "... wa-qad wasamnaÌ„ haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b bi-'NadÌ£rat al-ighriÌ„dÌ£ fiÌ„ nusÌ£rat al-qariÌ„dÌ£' ..."

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h al-baÌ„hirah aÌ„yaÌ„tuhu, al-qaÌ„hirah satÌ£awaÌ„tuhu, al-qadiÌ„m ihÌ£saÌ„nuhu, al-Ê»azÌ£iÌ„m sultÌ£aÌ„nuhu, al-saÌ„bighah mawaÌ„hibuhu, al-saÌ„Ê¼ighah mashaÌ„ribuhu, al-waÌ„siÊ» juÌ„duhu, al-qaÌ„miÊ» waÊ»iÌ„duhu ..."
Script: In medium clear naskh script; in black ink, on white polished paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings and markings in red; text within red line border.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.

On folio 1a (in red): "KitaÌ„b 'NadÌ£rat al-ighriÌ„dÌ£ fiÌ„ nusÌ£rat al-qariÌ„dÌ£', taÊ¼liÌ„f al-Ê»abd al-mushfiq min dhanbih, al-raÌ„jiÌ„ rahÌ£mat Rabbihi, AbiÌ„ Ê»AliÌ„ al-MuzÌ£affar ibn al-Sayyid AbiÌ„ al-QaÌ„sim al-FadÌ£l ibn AbiÌ„ JaÊ»far YahÌ£yaÌ ibn AbiÌ„ YahÌ£yaÌ Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn AbiÌ„ Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h JaÊ»far al-Ê»AlawiÌ„ al-HÌ£usayniÌ„, Ê»ufiya Ê»anhu. AÌ„miÌ„n."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "MimmaÌ„ intazÌ£ama fiÌ„ silk milk al-faqiÌ„r ilayhi taÊ»aÌ„laÌ AhÌ£mad ibn NaÌ„sÌ£ir al-DiÌ„n ibn Ê»AliÌ„ BiqaÌ„Ê»iÌ„ ZaÌ„dah al-ShaÌ„miÌ„, min khatÌ£tÌ£ yadihi, Ê»ufiya Ê»anhum. AÌ„miÌ„n."

On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Waqf"; An illegible endowment stamp; two illegible round stamps; and large round ownership stamp "Min mutamallakaÌ„t al-faqiÌ„r al-HÌ£aÌ„jj MusÌ£tÌ£afaÌ SÌ£idqiÌ„ ghufira la-hu".

Colophon (folio 131b): "KaÌ„tibuhu al-mustamidd min bahÌ£r karamihi taÊ»aÌ„laÌ wa-ihÌ£saÌ„nih, wa-al-laÌ„Ê¼idh bi-aÊ»taÌ„bih, wa-al-mustafiÌ„dÌ£ min Ê»aliÌ„ jinaÌ„bih, AhÌ£mad ibn NaÌ„sÌ£ir al-DiÌ„n ibn Ê»AliÌ„ BiqaÌ„Ê»iÌ„ al-ShaÌ„miÌ„, bi-MadiÌ„nat QustÌ£antÌ£iÌ„niÌ„yah, li-thamaÌ„n layaÌ„lin baqiÌ„na min shahr DhiÌ„ al-QaÊ»dah, al-munsalikh min libaÌ„s sanat tisÊ» wa-thalaÌ„thiÌ„n wa-miÊ¼ah wa-alf [11 July 1727], amaddahum AllaÌ„h bi-al-Ê»afw wa-al-ghufraÌ„n, maÊ»a al-mukhlisÌ£iÌ„n min al-ikhwaÌ„n. AÌ„miÌ„n, AÌ„miÌ„n. Wa-sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi wa-sallam. M."

On folios 132b-134a: A poem in 65 verses, by KiÌ„waÌ„n ZaÌ„dah AhÌ£mad BiÌ„k AfandiÌ„ al-SharjiÌ„ (could not be identified). Starts with: AarjuÌ„ min al-ilmaÌ„mi bi-al-tÌ£alali al-baÌ„liÌ„ // li-maÌ„ biya iblaÌ„lan wa-dhaÌ„lika ablaÌ liÌ„ ..." And ends with: "AhÌ£abbu ilaÌ qalbiÌ„ min al-khuldi mawtÌ£inan // idhaÌ„ hÌ£aÌ„waluÌ„ fiÌ„ al-khuldi dhillata amthaÌ„liÌ„." With the following note (in another hand): "Qad intahat haÌ„dhihi al-qasÌ£iÌ„dah al-gharraÌ„Ê¼ al-mushtamilah Ê»alaÌ al-fasÌ£aÌ„hÌ£ah wa-al-balaÌ„ghah wa-insijaÌ„m al-alfaÌ„zÌ£ maÊ»a hÌ£usn al-sÌ£iyaÌ„ghah bi-khatÌ£tÌ£ yad munshiÊ¼ihaÌ„ wa-naÌ„zÌ£imihaÌ„ wa-Ê»aÌ„mir riyaÌ„dÌ£ihaÌ„ bi-badiÌ„Ê» naghamaÌ„t hÌ£amaÌ„Ê¼imihaÌ„ akhiÌ„naÌ„ al-kariÌ„m wa-sÌ£adiÌ„qinaÌ„ al-hÌ£amiÌ„m al-baÌ„riÊ» al-faÌ„dÌ£il wa-al-lawdhaÊ»iÌ„ al-kaÌ„mil KiÌ„waÌ„n ZaÌ„dah AhÌ£mad BiÌ„k AfandiÌ„ al-SharjiÌ„, hÌ£arasa AllaÌ„h dhaÌ„tahu hÌ£aythu kaÌ„na, wa-abqaÌ„hu bi-khayr wa-ihÌ£saÌ„n, bi-jaÌ„h al-NabiÌ„, Ê»alayhi al-sÌ£alaÌ„h wa-al-salaÌ„m."
On folio 139a-139b: Miscellaneous anecdotes in prose and poetry.
On folio 139b: An ownership statement: "Min mutamallakaÌ„t AhÌ£mad BiqaÌ„Ê»iÌ„ ZaÌ„dah, min khatÌ£tÌ£ihi, Ê»ufiya Ê»anhu."

record.title: 880-03 KitaÌ„b al-DÌ£iyaÌ„Ê¼ : manuscript / AbuÌ„ al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m al-Ê»UmaÌ„niÌ„ al-Ê»AwtabiÌ„ al-SÌ£uhÌ£aÌ„riÌ„ Ì„.
record.note: Copied on Friday, twelve nights having passed from the month of MuhÌ£arram of the year 1127 of the Hijrah (18 January 1715), by MahÌ£buÌ„b ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d ibn RaÌ„shid al-MiÊ»waliÌ„, during the reign of al-ImaÌ„m SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn al-ImaÌ„m SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„, for al-Shaykh AhÌ£mad ibn SulaymaÌ„n ibn AhÌ£mad al-Ê»AÌ„tiÌ„ al-ManahÌ£iÌ„. Place of copying not mentioned.

Incipit (folio 10b): "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m, wa-bi-hi thiqatiÌ„. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ laÌ„ tudrikuhu al-aÊ»yun muawjuÌ„dan, wa-laÌ„ tasÌ£ifuhu al-alsun mahÌ£duÌ„dan, wa-laÌ„ yukayyifuhu al-fikr maÊ»duÌ„dan, wa-laÌ„ taÊ»rifuhu al-khaliÌ„qah waÌ„lidan wa-laÌ„ mawluÌ„dan, ahÌ£maduhu Ê»alaÌ niÊ»amihi wa-aÌ„laÌ„Ê¼ih, wa-ashkuruhu Ê»alaÌ hÌ£usn qisamihi wa-balaÌ„Ê¼ihi, wa-aÊ»uÌ„dhu bi-hi min niqamihi wa-ibtilaÌ„Ê¼ihi, hÌ£amdan ithra hÌ£amd, wa-Ê»awdan baÊ»da buduÌ„win ..."
Script: In fair large naskh script; in black ink, on white polished paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings and markings in red.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Inside the front cover: An ownership statement: "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b mulkan liÌ„, wa-anaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad ibn JumÊ»ah ibn Ê»AÌ„mir ibn SÌ£aÌ„lihÌ£ al-Ê»AÌ„tiÌ„, wa-katabtuhu bi-yadiÌ„." And a reader's statement: "BadaÊ¼naÌ„ bi-qiraÌ„Ê¼at haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b yawm 13 RamadÌ£aÌ„n, sanat 1249 [24 January 1834]. Katabahu SaÊ»iÌ„d ibn SaÌ„lim bi-yadihi."

On folio 6b-7a: A poem attributed to the author, starts as follows: "Wa-qaÌ„la AbuÌ„ al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m al-Ê»UmaÌ„niÌ„ al-Ê»AwtabiÌ„ al-SÌ£uhÌ£aÌ„riÌ„: HaÌ„dhaÌ„ kitaÌ„bu dÌ£iyaÌ„Ê¼in fiÌ„ al-quluÌ„bi akhiÌ„ // akrim bimaÌ„ fiÌ„hi min Ê»ilmin wa-min adabi. Sammaytuhu bi-al-DÌ£iyaÌ„ idh kaÌ„na fiÌ„hi hudan // min al-Ê»amaÌ wa-dÌ£iyaÌ„ min zÌ£ulmati al-Ê»atÌ£abi. KhasÌ£asÌ£tu nafsiÌ„ bi-hi hÌ£ubban wa-maÊ»rifatan // la-hu wa-sÌ£annaftuhu min asÌ£daqi al-kutubi ..." And ends with: "... HÌ£amaÌ„niya AllaÌ„hu min zayghin wa-min zalalin // Ê»umriÌ„ wa-Ê»allamaniÌ„ Ê»ilman wa-Ê»allama biÌ„. Tammat al-abyaÌ„t al-mansuÌ„bah ilaÌ AbiÌ„ al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim al-Ê»AwtabiÌ„ al-SÌ£uhÌ£aÌ„riÌ„, taghammadahu AllaÌ„h bi-rahÌ£matihi."

On folio 7b: "al-JuzÊ¼ al-awwal. FiÌ„ tÌ£alab al-Ê»ilm, min KitaÌ„b al-DÌ£iyaÌ„Ê¼, taÊ¼liÌ„f al-Shaykh al-Ê»AÌ„lim al-Ê»allaÌ„mah, al-wariÊ» al-hÌ£abr al-fahhaÌ„mah, AbiÌ„ al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m al-Ê»UmaÌ„niÌ„ al-Ê»AwtabiÌ„ al-SÌ£uhÌ£aÌ„riÌ„, taghammadahu AllaÌ„h bi-rahÌ£matihi. Wa-yatluÌ„hhu, in shaÌ„Ê¼a AllaÌ„h, al-juzÊ¼ al-thaÌ„niÌ„ min KitaÌ„b al-DÌ£iyaÌ„Ê¼, fiÌ„maÌ„ yajuÌ„zu min al-sÌ£ifaÌ„t, taÊ¼liÌ„f al-Shaykh AbiÌ„ al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn IbraÌ„hiÌ„m al-Ê»UmaÌ„niÌ„."
On folio 8b-9a: Table of contents (in 28 chapters)

Colophon (folio 261): "Tammat al-qitÌ£Ê»ah al-uÌ„laÌ min KitaÌ„b al-DÌ£iyaÌ„Ê¼, fiÌ„ tÌ£alab al-Ê»ilm wa-fiÌ„ shayÊ¼ min al-tawhÌ£iÌ„d, bi-Ê»awn AllaÌ„h wa-hÌ£amdih, wa-sÌ£alawaÌ„tuhu Ê»alaÌ MuhÌ£ammad khayr khalqih wa-aÌ„lihi wa-sallam. Wa-kaÌ„na al-faraÌ„gh min naskhihi sÌ£abaÌ„hÌ£ al-JumÊ»ah al-zahraÌ„Ê¼, saÌ„Ê»at al-Qamar, li-ithnatay Ê»ashrata laylatin khalat min shahr MuhÌ£arram al-hÌ£araÌ„m, sanat sabÊ» siniÌ„n wa-Ê»ishriÌ„n wa-miÊ¼ah wa-alf sanah min al-Hijrah al-NabawiÌ„yah [18 January 1715]. Wa-sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad al-NabiÌ„ wa-aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi wa-sallama tasliÌ„man kathiÌ„ran. Ê»AlaÌ yaday al-Ê»abd al-aqall al-faqiÌ„r lillaÌ„h Ê»azza wa-jall, MahÌ£buÌ„b ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn SaÊ»iÌ„d ibn RaÌ„shid al-MiÊ»waliÌ„, fiÌ„ Ê»asÌ£r al-ImaÌ„m al-Ê»adl SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn al-ImaÌ„m SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf al-YaÊ»rubiÌ„, aÊ»azzahu AllaÌ„h wa-nasÌ£arahu, lil-Shaykh al-WaÌ„liÌ„ al-waliÌ„ al-muwaÌ„liÌ„, al-Ê»adl al-radÌ£iÌ„, AhÌ£mad ibn SulaymaÌ„n ibn AhÌ£mad al-Ê»AÌ„tiÌ„ al-ManahÌ£iÌ„, razaqahu AllaÌ„h hÌ£ifzÌ£ahu wa-al-Ê»amal bi-maÌ„ fiÌ„hi."

On the right margin of the colophon: "Ê»UridÌ£a Ê»alaÌ nuskhatihi allatiÌ„ nusikha minhaÌ„ bi-hÌ£asb al-tÌ£aÌ„qah wa-al-imkaÌ„n bi-HÌ£isÌ£n Qaryat IzkiÌ„. Katabahu maÌ„likuhu min fadÌ£l maÌ„likihi, AhÌ£mad ibn SulaymaÌ„n ibn AhÌ£mad al-Ê»AÌ„tiÌ„ al-ManahÌ£iÌ„ bi-yadihi, 14 RabiÌ„Ê» al-Awwal, sanat 1127 [20 March 1715]."
On folio 262b: A poem (in 12 verses) by al-MuqannaÊ» al-KindiÌ„ (MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»Umayrah, -approximately 690).
On folio 264b: A poem (in 9 verses) by Khalaf ibn SinaÌ„n.

record.title: 880-03 FathÌ£ al-aqfaÌ„l wa-hÌ£all al-ishkaÌ„l bi-SharhÌ£ LaÌ„miÌ„yat al-afÊ»aÌ„l : al-mashhuÌ„r bi-al-SharhÌ£ al-kabiÌ„r : manuscript / JamaÌ„l al-DiÌ„n MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»Umar BahÌ£raq.
record.note: Copied 15 RabiÌ„Ê» al-AÌ„khir, of the year 1021 of the Hijrah (15 June 1612), by SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn al-ImaÌ„m Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n. Place of copying not mentioned.

Incipit (folio 3b): "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m, wa-bi-hi nastaÊ»iÌ„n, wa-Ê»alayhi natawakkalu, wa-Huwa hÌ£asbiÌ„ wa-niÊ»ma al-wakiÌ„l. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h al-mutasÌ£arrif qabla Ê»ilal al-tasÌ£riÌ„f, al-mutaÊ»arrif qabla aÌ„lat al-taÊ»riÌ„f, alladhiÌ„ allafa al-ashyaÌ„Ê¼ ahÌ£sana taÊ¼liÌ„f, wa-hÌ£ammala al-insaÌ„n amaÌ„nat al-takliÌ„f, wa-sharrafa al-Ê»ilm wa-ahlahu akmal al-tashriÌ„f, ahÌ£maduhu Ê»alaÌ jamiÌ„Ê» niÊ»amihi wa-afdÌ£aÌ„lih, hÌ£amdan yaliÌ„qu bi-karam wajhihi wa-Ê»izz jalaÌ„lih ..."
Script: In fair medium naskh script; in black ink, on thick white paper; some notes on the margins; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings and markings in red; the verses of "LaÌ„miÌ„yat al-afÊ»aÌ„l" in bold script.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements: 1. "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b illi lil-walad HÌ£amiÌ„d bi-al-irth min abiÌ„hi." 2. "HaÌ„dha al-kitaÌ„b illi liÌ„ min miÌ„raÌ„th waÌ„lidiÌ„ NaÌ„sÌ£ir ibn AhÌ£mad al-LamakiÌ„, wa-katabahu AhÌ£mad ibn NaÌ„sÌ£ir al-LamakiÌ„ bi-yadihi."

On folio 1b: An advice, by a reader/owner: "HaÌ„ka nusÌ£hÌ£iÌ„ in kunta targhabu fiÌ„hi, wa-maqaÌ„liÌ„ in kunta mimman yaÊ»iÌ„hi, laÌ„ takun laÌ„bisan wa-anta hÌ£aqiÌ„r thawba kibarin wa-saÌ„hÌ£iban dhaylahu. Tamma haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-ithbaÌ„t (?) bi-Ê»awn al-Malik al-JabbaÌ„r. Wa-katabahu AhÌ£mad ibn NaÌ„sÌ£ir bi-yadihi."

Colophon (folio 110b): "Tamma al-kitaÌ„b bi-Ê»awn AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ, fiÌ„ al-yawm al-khaÌ„mis Ê»ashar min shahr RabiÌ„Ê» al-AÌ„khir, sanat 1021 min al-Hijrah al-NabawiÌ„yah [15 June 1612], bi-qalam al-faqiÌ„r ilaÌ AllaÌ„h SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn al-ImaÌ„m Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n, bi-yadihi. Nasakhahu li-waladihi wa-Ê»ariÌ„n al-thiqah NaÌ„sÌ£ir ibn AhÌ£mad ibn TamiÌ„m ibn AhÌ£mad al-RustaÌ„qiÌ„, razaqahu AllaÌ„h hÌ£ifzÌ£ahu wa-al-Ê»amal bimaÌ„ fiÌ„hi. Wa-laÌ„ hÌ£awla wa-laÌ„ quÌ„wata illaÌ„ billaÌ„h al-Ê»AliÌ„ al-Ê»AzÌ£iÌ„m."

On the right margin of the colophon: Partially obliterated ownership statement: "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b lil-Shaykh al-thiqah [... ... ...]. Wa-katabahu al-Ê»abd al-faqiÌ„r ilaÌ AllaÌ„h [... ...] li-yaÊ»lam al-waÌ„qif Ê»alayhi man maÌ„likuhu (?)."
On folio 111a: An unidentified text on morphology, titled "Nubdhah fiÌ„ al-tasÌ£riÌ„f", by SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn al-ImaÌ„m Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn SultÌ£aÌ„n ibn Sayf ibn MaÌ„lik.
On folio 111b: An invocation (in crude script).

On folios 113a-116b (in a different hand): An unidentified long poem on "TafsiÌ„r al-ruÊ¼yaÌ„" (Interpretation of dreams). It starts with: al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„hi baÌ„riÌ„ al-khalqi wa-al-sÌ£uwari // wa-baÌ„sitÌ£i al-rizqi lil-anÊ»aÌ„mi wa-al-bashari. Wa-kull khalqin baraÌ„hu AllaÌ„hu raÌ„ziquhu // wa-Huwa al-ghaniÌ„yu ilaÌ„hun ghayru muftaqiri. Wa-huwa al-QadiÌ„m wa-kullu al-khalqi ahÌ£dathahu // bi-laÌ„ mithaÌ„lin wa-laÌ„kin fiÊ»lu muqtadiri ..." It ends with: "... AbyaÌ„tuhaÌ„ miÊ¼atun maÊ»a tisÊ»atin Ê»adadan // wa-sittatun baÊ»dahaÌ„ jaÌ„Ê¼at Ê»alaÌ al-athari. HaÌ„dhaÌ„ wa-sÌ£allaÌ ilaÌ„hu al-Ê»aÌ„lamiÌ„n Ê»alaÌ // MuhÌ£ammadin khayri mabÊ»uÌ„thin Ê»alaÌ al-bashari. Wa-aÌ„lihi al-ghurri wa-al-atÌ£haÌ„ri innahumu // khayru al-bariÌ„yati min badwin wa-min hÌ£adÌ£ari."

On folio 119b: 1. Scribbles. 2. A borrowing note of the book: "Akhadhtu haÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b bi-al-Ê»aÌ„riyah al-marduÌ„dah ilaÌ ahlihaÌ„, wa-huwa min Ê»ind al-akh HÌ£aÌ„mid ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn TamiÌ„m. Wa-katabahu afqar al-Ê»ibaÌ„d al-aqall lillaÌ„h Ê»abduhu HÌ£amad ibn NaÌ„sÌ£ir ibn SulaymaÌ„n ibn WaliÌ„d bi-yadihi. TaÌ„riÌ„kh nahaÌ„r 16 min shahr RamadÌ£aÌ„n, sanat 1239 [15 May 1824]." 3. Two unidentified verses of poetry: "IdhaÌ„ lam takun ardÌ£iÌ„ li-Ê»irdÌ£iÌ„ masÌ£uÌ„natun // rahÌ£altu wa-law naÌ„dat fa-lastu ujiÌ„buhaÌ„. RahÌ£altu ilaÌ daÌ„rin siwaÌ„haÌ„ tuÊ»uzzuniÌ„ // wa-law kaÌ„na yaÊ»wiÌ„ liÌ„ min al-juÌ„Ê»i dhiÌ„buhaÌ„."

record.title: 880-03 KitaÌ„b ShamaÌ„Ê¼il al-NabiÌ„ sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlaÌ„quhu wa-afÊ»aÌ„luhu : manuscript / tasÌ£niÌ„f al-Shaykh al-ImaÌ„m AbiÌ„ Ê»IÌ„saÌ al-TirmidhiÌ„.
record.note: Copied on a Friday morning (day and month not mentioned), of the year 1253 of the Hijrah (1837 or 1838), in the city of ZabiÌ„d (Yemen), by MuhÌ£ammad YaÌ„siÌ„n al-HÌ£abashiÌ„.

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m, wa-bi-hi nastaÊ»iÌ„n. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h wa-salaÌ„mun Ê»alaÌ Ê»ibaÌ„dihi alladhiÌ„n isÌ£tÌ£afaÌ. QaÌ„la al-Shaykh al-HÌ£aÌ„fizÌ£ AbuÌ„ Ê»IÌ„saÌ MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»IÌ„saÌ ibn SuÌ„rah al-TirmidhiÌ„, rahÌ£imahu AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ: BaÌ„b maÌ„ jaÌ„Ê¼a fiÌ„ khalq RasuÌ„l AllaÌ„h, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, akhbaranaÌ„ AbuÌ„ RajaÌ„Ê¼ Qutaybah ibn SaÊ»d, Ê»an MaÌ„lik ibn Anas, Ê»an RabiÌ„Ê»ah ibn AbiÌ„ Ê»Abd al-RahÌ£maÌ„n, Ê»an Anas ibn MaÌ„lik, radÌ£iya AllaÌ„h Ê»anhu, annahu samiÊ»ahu yaquÌ„lu: KaÌ„na RasuÌ„l AllaÌ„h, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-tÌ£awiÌ„l al-baÌ„Ê¼in wa-laÌ„ bi-al-qasÌ£iÌ„r al-mutaraddid, wa-laÌ„ bi-al-abyadÌ£ al-amhaq, wa-laÌ„ bi-al-jaÊ»id al-qatÌ£itÌ£, wa-laÌ„ bi-al-sibtÌ£, baÊ»athahu AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ Ê»alaÌ raÊ¼s arbaÊ»iÌ„n sanah, fa-aqaÌ„ma bi-Makkah Ê»ashr siniÌ„n, wa-bi-al-MadiÌ„nah Ê»ashr siniÌ„n, fa-tawaffaÌ„hu AllaÌ„h taÊ»aÌ„laÌ Ê»alaÌ raÊ¼s sittiÌ„n sanah ..."
Script: In coarse medium naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings and keywords in red.
Binding: The four loose quires are in a dark brown leather cover, Type III (without flap).
With one other title: KitaÌ„b Kanz al-hÌ£aqaÌ„Ê¼iq fiÌ„ HÌ£adiÌ„th Khayr al-KhalaÌ„Ê¼iq, by Ê»Abd al-RaÊ¼uÌ„f ibn TaÌ„j al-Ê»AÌ„rifiÌ„n al-MunaÌ„wiÌ„.
Penciled note on last (blank) page: "Purchased at Mocha. C.P. [i.e. C. Pickering] 1844".

Colophon: "Tammat bi-hÌ£amd AllaÌ„h wa-hÌ£usn tawfiÌ„qih, fa-li-AllaÌ„h al-hÌ£amd Ê»alaÌ dhaÌ„lik. Bi-raqm al-faqiÌ„r ilaÌ AllaÌ„h MuhÌ£ammad YaÌ„siÌ„n al-HÌ£abashiÌ„, ghafara AllaÌ„h la-hu wa-li-waÌ„lidayhi, wa-li-jamiÌ„Ê» mashaÌ„yikhihi, wa-li-jamiÌ„Ê» al-MuslimiÌ„n, wa-dhaÌ„lika nahaÌ„r al-JumÊ»ah, waqt al-dÌ£uhÌ£aÌ, bi-MadiÌ„nat ZabiÌ„d al-mahÌ£miÌ„yah. Wa-sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ SayyidinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi wa-sallam. Sanat 1253 [1837/1838]."

On the back of the wrapping sheet: A delivery note: "IlaÌ MadiÌ„nat ZabiÌ„d. Sullima bi-yad al-Shaykh MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»Umar YaÌ„siÌ„n al-JabartiÌ„ fiÌ„ bayt SayyidiÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»Abd al-RahÌ£maÌ„n ibn SulaymaÌ„n."

record.title: 880-02 KitaÌ„b Kanz al-hÌ£aqaÌ„Ê¼iq fiÌ„ HÌ£adiÌ„th Khayr al-KhalaÌ„Ê¼iq : manuscript / Ê»Abd al-RaÊ¼uÌ„f ibn TaÌ„j al-Ê»AÌ„rifiÌ„n al-MunaÌ„wiÌ„.
record.note: The manuscript is incomplete. Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 19th century.

On folio 1a: "KitaÌ„b Kanz al-hÌ£aqaÌ„Ê¼iq fiÌ„ HÌ£adiÌ„th Khayr al-KhalaÌ„Ê¼iq, taÊ¼liÌ„f al-Shaykh al-ImaÌ„m Ê»alam al-aÊ¼immah al-aÊ»laÌ„m, al-hÌ£aÌ„fizÌ£ al-muhÌ£aqqiq al-mudaqqiq Ê»Abd al-RaÊ¼uÌ„f al-MunaÌ„wiÌ„, rahÌ£imahu AllaÌ„h rahÌ£mat al-abraÌ„r, wa-askanahu jannaÌ„t tajriÌ„ min tahÌ£tihaÌ„ al-anhaÌ„r, bi-hÌ£aqq NabiÌ„yihi al-MukhtaÌ„r, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam."

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. Rabbi yassir wa-tammim. YaÌ„ KariÌ„m. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ kasaÌ„ ahl al-HÌ£adiÌ„th burd al-sharaf fiÌ„ kull iqliÌ„m, wa-rafaÊ»a shaÊ¼nahum, wa-aÊ»laÌ dhikrahum fiÌ„ kull hÌ£adiÌ„th wa-qadiÌ„m, wa-hÌ£affahum min bayn jumlat al-sharÊ» bi-maziÌ„d al-tashriÌ„f wa-al-taÊ»zÌ£iÌ„m ... Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. al-HÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h Rabb al-Ê»AÌ„lamiÌ„n wa-al-Ê»aÌ„fiyah lil-muttaqiÌ„n. Wa-al-sÌ£alaÌ„h wa-al-salaÌ„m Ê»alaÌ RasuÌ„l AllaÌ„h, SayyidinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad, al-NabbiÌ„ al-UmmiÌ„, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi wa-sallam, ajmaÊ»iÌ„n. Wa-baÊ»d, fa-yajibu Ê»alaÌ al-Ê»abd awwala an yaÊ»rifa al-iÌ„maÌ„n wa-al-IslaÌ„m. Fa-in qiÌ„la laka maÌ„ awwal shayÊ¼ yajibu Ê»alaÌ al-insaÌ„n, fa-qul Ê»alaÌ kull mukallaf an yaÊ»rifa annahu makhluÌ„q, wa-anna la-hu khaÌ„liqan wa-raÌ„ziqan wa-huwa AllaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ laÌ„ ilaÌ„ha illaÌ„ huwa, thumma yajibu Ê»alayhi an yaÊ»rifa al-iÌ„maÌ„n wa-al-IslaÌ„m, li-anna saÊ»aÌ„dat [al-]daÌ„rayn laÌ„ yakuÌ„nu illaÌ„ bihimaÌ„ ..."
Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on thick cream color paper; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
Binding: Unbound. The eight leaves (one quire) are housed in a dark brown folded sheet of parchment.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... wa-ammaÌ„ alladhiÌ„n lam yasjud wa-lam yandam hum alladhiÌ„n yuÌ„laduÌ„n kaÌ„firan wa-yamuÌ„tuÌ„na kaÌ„firan. AllaÌ„humma laÌ„ tajÊ»alnaÌ„ minhum, fa-hum sabab sÌ£aÌ„ra al-naÌ„s arbaÊ»at al-tÌ£awaÌ„Ê¼if. AllaÌ„humma ijÊ»alnaÌ„ wa-iÌ„yaÌ„kum min alladhiÌ„n al-tÌ£aÌ„Ê¼ifah alladhiÌ„n yuÌ„laduÌ„na MuslimiÌ„n wa-yamuÌ„tuÌ„na MuslimiÌ„n, bi-barakat NabiÌ„yinaÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad, sÌ£allaÌ AllaÌ„h Ê»alayhi wa-sallam, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-sÌ£ahÌ£bihi ajmaÊ»iÌ„n, wa-ijÊ»alnaÌ„ min al-taÌ„biÊ»iÌ„n lahum qawlan wa-fiÊ»lan. AÌ„miÌ„n. Tamma al-kitaÌ„b."

record.title: 880-03 Durrat al-ghawwaÌ„sÌ£ fiÌ„ awhaÌ„m al-khawaÌ„sÌ£sÌ£ : manuscript / AbuÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad al-QaÌ„sim ibn Ê»AliÌ„ ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»UthmaÌ„n al-HÌ£ariÌ„riÌ„ al-BasÌ£riÌ„.
record.note: Copied on Friday, 23 MuhÌ£arram, of the year 1195 of the Hijrah (19 January 1781), by Ê»Umar ibn SulaymaÌ„n. Place of copying not mentioned.

Incipit: "BismillaÌ„h al-RahÌ£maÌ„n al-RahÌ£iÌ„m. QaÌ„la al-Shaykh al-RaÊ¼iÌ„s AbuÌ„ MuhÌ£ammad al-QaÌ„sim ibn Ê»AliÌ„ ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn Ê»UthmaÌ„n al-HÌ£ariÌ„riÌ„ al-BasÌ£riÌ„, radÌ£iya AllaÌ„h Ê»anhu: BaÊ»da hÌ£amd AllaÌ„h alladhiÌ„ Ê»amma Ê»ibaÌ„dahu bi-wazÌ£aÌ„Ê¼if al-Ê»awaÌ„rif, wa-khasÌ£sÌ£a man shaÌ„Ê¼a minhum bi-latÌ£aÌ„Ê¼if al-maÊ»aÌ„rif, wa-al-sÌ£alaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ MuhÌ£ammad al-Ê»aÌ„qib, wa-Ê»alaÌ aÌ„lihi wa-asÌ£hÌ£aÌ„bihi uliÌ„ al-manaÌ„qib, fa-inniÌ„ raÊ¼ytu kathiÌ„ran mimman tasannamuÌ„ asnimat al-rutab wa-tawassamuÌ„ simatan qad dÌ£aÌ„haw al-Ê»aÌ„mmah fiÌ„ baÊ»dÌ£ maÌ„ yafrutÌ£u min kalaÌ„mihim ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Durrat al-ghawwaÌ„sÌ£ fiÌ„ awhaÌ„m al-khawaÌ„sÌ£sÌ£' ..."

Decoration: Keywords and markings in red.
Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with gilded central medallion.
Inside the front cover: "LaÌ„ diÌ„n illaÌ„ al-IslaÌ„m, wa-laÌ„ madhhab illaÌ„ madhhab ahl al-istiqaÌ„mah, alaÌ„ wa-hum al-firqah al-IbaÌ„dÌ£iÌ„yah al-mardÌ£iÌ„yah."

On folio 1a: Two popular medicinal recipes, and two ownership statements: 1. "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b liÌ„, wa-huwa fiÌ„ milkiÌ„, wa-anaÌ„ al-hÌ£aqiÌ„r AhÌ£mad ibn HÌ£ammaÌ„d ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn SaÌ„lim al-BastÌ£, hÌ£urrira bi-yadihi (?), 8 SÌ£afar, sanat 1260 [28 February 1844]." 2. "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b, wa-huwa fiÌ„ milkiÌ„, wa-anaÌ„ al-hÌ£aqiÌ„r AhÌ£mad ibn HÌ£ammaÌ„d ibn MuhÌ£ammad ibn SaÌ„lim al-BastÌ£. FiÌ„ shahr SÌ£afar, hÌ£urrira fiÌ„ yawm thaÌ„min, fiÌ„ sanat 1260 [28 February 1844]. Wa-katabahu al-hÌ£aqiÌ„r SaÊ»d ibn NaÌ„sÌ£ir ibn Ê»Abd al-RasuÌ„l."

Inside the back cover: "TaÌ„riÌ„kh yawm saÌ„far ilaÌ Bandar ZanjibaÌ„r yawm 8 MuhÌ£arram, sanat 1260 [29 January 1844], wa-kaÌ„na Khalaf (?) ibn SaÌ„lim ibn Khalaf (?) ibn SaÌ„lim al-BastÌ£. WasÌ£altu Bandar Maskad hÌ£aÌ„l rujuÌ„Ê»inaÌ„ yawm 24 RabiÌ„Ê» al-Awwal, sanat 1260 [13 April 1844]."

Colophon (flolio 119b): "Tammat haÌ„dhihi al-nuskhah al-shariÌ„fah nahaÌ„r al-JumÊ»ah, al-thaÌ„lith wa-al-Ê»ishriÌ„n min MuhÌ£arram al-hÌ£araÌ„m, sanat 1195 [19 January 1781], bi-yad al-hÌ£aqiÌ„r Ê»Umar ibn SulaymaÌ„n, ghafara AllaÌ„h la-hu wa-li-waÌ„lidayhi, wa-ahÌ£sana ilayhimaÌ„ wa-ilayhi."

record.title: Stephen Vincent BeneÌt letter, to Major Pond, 1928 September : manuscript.
record.note: This letter is addressed to Major Pond, but BeneÌt may have forgotten, or was unaware, that Major James B. Pond had passed away in 1903. James Barton Pond, Jr. ran his father's lecture managment company after his father's death, and this may be who BeneÌt was intending to address in this letter.
Accompanied by a typescript transcription of the letter with pencil revisions in an unknown hand.
Date is taken from a answered stamp on the letter, dated September 17, 1928, indicating that Pond had answered BeneÌt's letter on that date.

record.title: Miscellaneous theological tracts : manuscript.
record.note: Script: In sertÌ£o (West Syriac script), in different hands; in black ink, on thick cream color paper; few notes on the margins; catchwords.
Decoration: Headings and markings in red.
Layout: In single and double column of different lines.

On the page attached to folio 1: "This ancient Ms. I obtained from a Jacobite in Mosul and may serve to show those who read Gershuni (Arabic in Syriac characters) the mode of interpreting the mooted passages in the N. T. on which are formulated the tenets of the Jacobite Monophysites of Mesopotamia. It is entitled The Book of Questions. The answers, it is but just to say, are not generally accepted by this sect at present. A small gift to the American Oriental Society, New Haven, CT."
On folio 1a: Two ownership statements: "1. [HaÌ„dh]aÌ„ maÌ„l Ê»Abd AllaÌ„h ibn Ê»Abd al-KariÌ„m alladhiÌ„ (?) huwa min Balad [...] al-maÊ»muÌ„rah." 2. "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ maÌ„l Ê»Abd al-MasiÌ„hÌ£."

On folio 5a: An index of "KitaÌ„b al-tilmiÌ„dh wa-al-muÊ»allim" (in 22 chapters), copied by IstaÌ„niÌ„s: "Kamulat fahrasat KitaÌ„b al-mubaÌ„rak al-Ê»azÌ£iÌ„m KitaÌ„b al-tilmiÌ„dh wa-al-muÊ»allim." And in Syriac: "UsÌ£alaw bhÌ£uÌ„baÌ„ AlahayaÌ„ Ê»al Ê»al EstaÌ„niÌ„s mhÌ£iÌ„laÌ„ da-ktaÌ„b."
On folio 122a and 122b: An ownership statement: "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b maÌ„l HÌ£ajar (?) ibn AntÌ£uÌ„n."

At the end of folio 125b: "Kamula wa-najaz 'KitaÌ„b al-MaqaÌ„laÌ„t' bi-Ê»awn AllaÌ„h, Ê»alaÌ yad ahÌ£qar Ê»abiÌ„d AllaÌ„h, MansÌ£uÌ„r al-dhaliÌ„l al-hÌ£aqiÌ„r al-ghariÌ„b al-mustaghfir, wa-lillaÌ„h al-majd."

At the end of folio 133a: "Kamula bi-Ê»awn AllaÌ„h QisÌ£sÌ£at RaÌ„hib al-SÌ£iÌ„n, ajal al-raÌ„hib al-mukarram, al-rajul al-faÌ„zÌ£il, RaÌ„hib IÌ„shuÌ„Ê», sÌ£alaÌ„tuhu maÊ»anaÌ„. AÌ„miÌ„n. Wa-anaÌ„ al-khaÌ„tÌ£iÌ„ atÌ£lubu al-maghfirah min al-naÌ„zÌ£ir fiÌ„ haÌ„dhihi al-qisÌ£sÌ£ah, wa-kull man qaraÊ¼a wa-kataba wa-qaÌ„la AÌ„miÌ„n. AÌ„miÌ„n."
At the end of folio 152b: "Kamula bi-Ê»awn AllaÌ„h 'SÌ£uÊ»uÌ„d al-QiddiÌ„s BuÌ„lusÌ£', sÌ£alaÌ„tuhu maÊ»anaÌ„. AÌ„miÌ„n."

At the end of folio 163b: "Kamulat MasaÌ„Ê¼il BasiÌ„liyuÌ„s wa-GhariÌ„ghuriyuÌ„s, wa-al-hÌ£amdu lillaÌ„h Rabb al-Ê»AÌ„lamiÌ„n. AÌ„miÌ„n. AÌ„miÌ„n. AÌ„miÌ„n. Wa-rahÌ£mat AllaÌ„h Ê»alaÌ MansÌ£uÌ„r al-miskiÌ„n. SriÌ„tÌ£ ba-shnat APPA (?) d-Yawn."

At the end of folio 196b: "Kamulat QisÌ£sÌ£at al-Malik al-Ibn."
At the margins of folio 197a: Some scribbles and calculations."
At the end of folio 212a: "Kamula IktishaÌ„f ShamÊ»uÌ„n bi-Ê»awn AllaÌ„h."
On folio 220a: A medicinal recipe and some calculations.

On folio 220b: An ownership statement: "HaÌ„dhaÌ„ al-kitaÌ„b al-mubaÌ„rak maÌ„l Jirjis ibn AntÌ£uÌ„n qad kana waqaÊ»a fiÌ„ sahmihi min hÌ£isÌ£sÌ£at AsÊ»ad Ê»Abd al-Ê»AziÌ„z, MaÌ„ la-hu ahÌ£ad daÊ»wah wa-laÌ„ tÌ£ilbah. Sanat [...] MasiÌ„hÌ£iÌ„yah." And some scribbles.

Inside the back cover: "YasÌ£al al-khatÌ£tÌ£ ilaÌ mahÌ£ruÌ„sÌ£at (mahÌ£ruÌ„sat?) al-MuÌ„sÌ£il wa-yatasallam bi-yad Qass NiÊ»mat AllaÌ„h al-mukarram." And some scribbles.

record.title: 880-01 Dhammapada AtÌ£tÌ£hakathaÌ„ (fragment).
record.note: Title from manuscript; title is written on verso of each leaf in the right margin in red ink.
Layout: single column of eight lines
Binding: unbound. Manuscript leaves have two holes for string intended to bind together leaves.
Decoration: decorated with stylized pipal leaves in red ink at both ends of each leaf (recto and verso).

record.title: 880-01 KammavaÌ„caÌ„.
record.note: Title from manuscript; title is written on verso of each leaf in the right margin in red ink.
Layout: single column of six lines
Script: tamarind-seed Burmese script; written in laquer on a gold background.
Binding: stored in red wooden covers. One hole for binding string can be seen on all the leaves and covers. String itself is wanting.

Decoration: decorated margins on first and final leaves depicting devas holding flower. The front and back covers are highly decorated and depict two pairs of devas facing each other, and surrounding motifs include intertwined naÌ„gas,foliage, and birds.

The pagination markers (in circles on the left of each leaf) seem to have been supplied by a later hand, replacing earlier ones that had become faint. After the first leaf, the pagination system changes (ka, khaÌ„, khi, khiÌ„... rather than e.g. ka, kaÌ„, ki, kiÌ„...).
